description: Erection of single storey rear wrap-around extension and formation of basement with a front lightwell.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Drawings GTD1095 - 03HPA(Rev.A) and GTD1095 - 04HPA(Rev.A), received 11/07/2022. Drawings GTD1095 - 02HPA, GTD1095 - 01HPA and GTD1095 - 06HPA and Construction Management Plan and Fire Statement, received 31/03/2022. Location Plan and Flood Risk Assessment (with Appendices), received 21/02/2022.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - No excavation or construction work shall be undertaken prior to the submission and approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority, of a detailed Construction Method Statement, which is certified by a qualified professional giving details of excavation, temporary works and construction techniques, including details of potential impacts on neighbouring land based on assessment of the geology and hydrology of the area. The basement extension should be carried in accordance with the details approved.
Condition : 5 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.

Condition : 6 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
Condition : 7 - The measures stated within hereby submitted and approved Flood Risk Assessment shall be adhered to during the construction and lifetime of hereby approved development.
